___autoScroll.description: Scroll the messages into the visible area of the window when receiving messages.

___enabled.description: If true the widget scrolls the messages into the visible area when receiving them.

___errors.description: If enabled, errors received via didEncounterError will be displayed too

___dismiss.description: Tells if and how messages may be dismissed by the user.

___enabled.description: If true, a button for dismissing is provided to the user.

___status.description: Flags by which the most severe level among all messages is indicated.

___reset.description: Delete all messages and set the state to BLANK

___variant.description: A layout-variant code (preliminary; 1: no alert/border, 2: single alert, 3: one alert per error-class, 4: one alert per message).

___i18n.description: Which locale to use for displaying this widget.

___locale.description: The topic under which to expect the locale for this widget.

___resource.description: List of resources for which publish- and validation-messages are processed.

___list.description: Resource topic list. Empty list serves as catch-all, null disables the resource-feature.

___replace.description: Whether to replace messages with success message.

___exclude.description: A list of resources to exclude from the display in case resource.list is set to catch-all.

name: laxar-messages-widget
description: Displays messages to the user, for example to communicate validation results.
